ygData.subject: Help in dueling
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night, I watched a level 26 necromancer with a pet, get wiped off of the face of Norrath by a 24th level ogre warrior. I have some strategies for necro
ygData.messageBody:
Last night, I watched a level 26 necromancer with a
pet, get wiped off of the face of Norrath by a 24th
level ogre warrior. I have some strategies for necro
against caster, but how do you fight a warrior? The
necro could not get any of his spells of as the
warrior bashed/kicked/slashed him to death. The fight
took a while as the necro ran around without much
effect. End result, one dead necro, ogre at half
health. They only thing I could think of was sic pet,
shadow step, cast darkness, then proceed.

I guess I have two questions:

What strategy do you all use for necro vs warrior
type?

What strategy do you all use for necro vs caster type?

I am really curious to see what everyone says to this.

Thanks!

Darkmoon Somberlight
24th level necromancer Quellious


=====
